content.detailedDescription: Saw lights for the second day in a row. this is our third time seeing them in total in my life...The first time was in 2002 i believe near the dump here in brantford, however each time has had differences in colour, shape and speed. it was frightening to observe and disappeared from sight after a few minutes.
content.summary: Saw strange lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: We just briefly caught a glimpse of a bright blue light moving very quickly northward in the general vicinity of downsview airport.  straight line path, faster and brighter than an airplane or helicopter.  do discernable features, just a large blue light, like a star.  witnessed by myself, my wife and daughter.  we lost sight of the object behind some trees, then went and ate hamburgers.
content.summary: Bright blue light moving in a straight line at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
On july 12th 2013 at 10:15 pm i walked out on to the porch look at my flower bed and some vegetables i had planted when i looked up at the west ward sky. it was lightning in the distance back twords lawndale and fallston nc, but it was far enough away that there was no sound. 

it hadn't rained or anything so i thought "well there is a storm on the way." as the clouds parted i saw a bright object. my first thought was that "that is cool looking.. it has to be the moon shining through the clouds."

this is where i realized it was something different because the moon never rises west where we live. i watched it for a moment and noticed the lightning or electricity. 

it was white and blue and it was bouncing around inside the circle. i watched it for approximately 1 min 30 seconds trying to figure out exactly what i was seeing, then the object suddenly grew very bright and in an instant, flew off quickly north by northwest almost blinding me for a second. as my eyes grew accustomed to the darkness again i saw a perfect triangle of clouds or smoke glowing in the sky where the object had been. this wasn't a trail like an airplane would leave and it was only in one spot. the triangle was perfect and looked like some kind of wierd smoke ring. it was bigger than the circle that had made it, almost like the circle would have fit directly into the middle of the triangle.

scared, i turned and ran into the house shouting for my wife and son and daughter in law to come and see. wife was washing dishes and son and daughter in law had just come in so they were in his bedroom.  i ran to the sink and pulled my wife's arm and turned and ran back out the door. by the time we got outside, the triangle was fading, but still visible. it persisted and vanished before our eyes in approx 2 mins or less.  me my wife and my son all saw the triangle of smoke. my daughter in law did not see the triangle because she was reluctant to come outside in the dark because of the insects.

shaken, i came in and wrote down what i saw, the time and direction that it went and a small sketch of what it looked like. i called my dad and was on the phone with him as i walked back outside. the time is now 10:35 pm. 

i abruptly hung up the phone with my dad when i saw the object come into view again in what appeared to be the same position as before. running back into the house i yelled frantically once again "its back!!.. dad called me crazy .. but its back again!!" for my family. i ran into the computer room and grabbed the camera from my desk to try and get a picture. 

while i was grabbing the camera, my son ran outside and to the end of the cement and saw the object. my daughter in law didn't see it because she was busy chaining the dog on the porch this time. the dog wasn't barking or anything. whatever it was, was far enough away that it didn't spook the dog.

my son said that it was triangle shaped object with blue and white lights that faded out within a 10-15 seconds.

by the time i got out the door past my daughter in law and to the ground in the front yard far enough north to see past the tree limb to get a picture, it was gone. no bright flash, no smoke triangle this time. nothing.. just darkness. i took a few shots of the sky where the object had been, but there was nothing there.

my son drew a small sketch on the back of the paper when we came back into the house about 20 mins later, that i had drawn mine on. it showed the position in the sky that he saw it and the shape. his description matched mine.

understand this was a circle at first, that i saw, that appeared huge. i thought it was the moon. it appeared that large in the sky. then it filled with electricty and suddenly took off northward at great speed with no sound. 

the cloud that it left behind was a perfect triangle shape and thick. i couldnt have drawn a perfect triangle like this. it almost pulsated, but i think that may have been my eyes adjusting back to the darkness after the flash. i thought at first i was crazy, but my wife and son saw the triangle in the sky and then later it returned and my son saw the craft.

i have been trying to understand what i saw and all i can think is that maybe the reason i didn't see the triangle craft the first time was because it was powering up or something for the burst of speed and maybe the pull of the air around it created the triangle cloud. i wish i could give you more detail but thats what i saw.
content.summary: Huge ball of light filled with electricity and then a triangle smoke cloud

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was loading items into my car web i looked up and saw a formation in a cloud i've never seen before.  like a straight path was cut through the cloud without explanation.  (see picture 1). the only plain in the area was not angled properly to have came from.That path.   then to my amazement as i watched a second, parallel path began to form through the cloud next to the first cutting from east to west towards me.  again no explanation for what was unfolding.  see pic 2 for beginning of second "plowed path" through clouds.  pic three shows the completely cleared path still with no planes anywhere near formation of second path.
content.summary: Observed invisible crafts cut paths through cloud.  noiseless.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog,out at 1900. scanning the cosmos the object in question caught my eye. it flew in a straight,line, west to east. it disappeared behind some trees blocking my view;could not pursuemduemto pond. said object looked very low, made no,sound, and had 4 bright white lights. it was cigar shaped, and moved,smoothly and quite fast. i watched it for 2 minutes; about the speed of a helicopter getting ready to land. speaking of helicopters, i saw numerous black ones flying around the following week.
content.summary: Flew in a straight line, saw numerous black helicopters  in the following days.

content.detailedDescription: Did not realize it at the time, discovered in photo just recently. i have a copy of the photo on my computer, my friend has the original.
content.summary: Have aphoto that i just recently noticed it in

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed and observing the night sky out of my bedroom window. there was a clear cresent moon and a very bright star that i believe was most likely the space station. as i looked to my left i noticed something moving rather slowly and it had very bright red and white flashing lights. it couldn't have been a plane or helicopter because it was travelling too slow and it appeared to be moving with a circular motion to the southwest. when my vision became obsured by the trees in my backyard i quickly ran to the deck and opened the door to watch it until it disappeared. there was no noise of any kind.
content.summary: Object with very bright, red and white lights. much brighter than a helicopter or plane, and it seemed to show all red and then all white.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on hwy 80 to gila bend- observed 2 hovering lights that were 20 mi south (about).  one burned out then another.  then they reappeared one then the other in the same place- i then recorded a 30 sec video.   then i saw 2 more lights appear 20k feet above those, then one disappeared then another.  the two original lights were horizontal ot each other then became vertical to each other.  i called a pilot friend and he couldnt explain what happened to me.  i dont believe in ufos, but ive never seen anything like it.
content.summary: I saw 2 hovering lights for 30 minutes then 2 more 20k feet above those that disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
Ill make this brief, 
1st ufo has been around my house for several weeks. does show a pattern in directional changes. rectangle, with 4 smaller rectangles at each corner. sometimes pulses, but it's not bright. at first i thought it was a safelight catching the sun, then it came back, but from a different direction and light pulse patterns. it also becomes extremely bright, bright enough to compete with the moon when it's full. i don't want to sound crazy but, when it is about to appear, i get a feeling that someone is watching. when this happens not to far afterwards this object appears. i've woken out of a dead sleep from this feeling, almost like a trained marine recon sniper. similar feeling occurs with the second object. 

second object(s)

2 white balls of light that are somewhat transparant, but isn't... if that makes anysense. walking along a busy street and two appear out of nowhere. after i got over the shock at how close they were, i reached for my phone to take a picture, and then when i returned my attention to the objects, they were gone. funny thing is, when i was going on my walk, i was thinking to myself "i wonder if ill ever be able to see a ufo type object in the daylight." well, sort answer...Yup.  before this appeared same feeling, like someone was watching me.
content.summary: 2 ufos. first one red rectangle pulses and brightens. sphere, white some what clear dissappers

content.detailedDescription: At cooper river park when we saw to lights, didn't think anything of it until we got home and rewatched the video. amazed to have seen over 27 lights blinking and changing spots with each other,
content.summary: Lights flashing in sequence so big, i have video

content.detailedDescription:
1pm- i was outside doing yardwork, when a helicopter approached from the south. it was s military blackhawk with no observable markings, traveling at high elevation and speed. despite the altitude, the engine noise was very loud, which led me to believe it was at full throttle.

traveling behind it were three dark objects, what i first thought were  birds due to their small size and erratic movements. as the helicopter got closer, it became apparent they were at similar elevation and speed.

the objects were tiny, almost invisible unless silhouetted against a cloud. they were some kind of plate shape (wide and thin) and spent most of the observed time banking, leaving only the slim profile to observe. they were black, and very, very small. as far as i could tell, they changed elevation easily.

in the first 60 seconds of my observation, they trailed behind the helicopter, flying in a triangle formation. it was very big and loose, the three individual objects banking in and out of formation.

in the last 60 seconds,  the broke formation and gained altitude. at least one got ahead of the helicopter, twisting in a s maneuver out of my line of sight. the other two climbed above the clouds, one totally disappearing, the other visible only briefly in breaks of the cloud.

the helicopter never deviated course or speed during this time, it continued on a ne heading. the objects appeared to be above it at all times, at least a thousand feet at the beginning, and then slightly more by the end.
content.summary: Three small objects trailed a military helicopter, erratically changing altitude and formation

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. traveling north on western avenue, passing 72nd street, in oklahoma city. followed object down 50th street towards penn street, to 44th street and may ave.

2. i noticed the object through the windshield of my truck, to the n/e above the power lines and rooftops, estimate less than 1500 ft. agl. the object was irradic in its flight stability and direction.

3. at first i believed it was an aircraft in distress, with the pilot struggling to maintain control and flight stability.

4. the object was traveling in a non-direct flight path from the n/e to the s/w, ascending and descending, wobbling, hovering, flipping over, reflecting light in certain relationship to the sun. the craft was definitely under intelligent control. i followed the craft and observed it travel towards will rogers international, then back towards the n/e, then n/b.

5. intensely fascinated and investigative.

6.The object traveled to the n, was below scattered cloud cover, then above it, just s of sun on horizon. traveled over sun ascending then turned n/w and ascended quickly out of visual sight.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark colored elongated object.

content.detailedDescription: Having a bonfire, the brightness of the object, knew it was not an aircraft,was very bright with pulsating light, observed through binoculars, many smaller light anomalies were going to and away from craft. the flight pattern was abrupt and random, not like anything i have seen before. the object was still moving in a random pattern but we got so tired we went on to bed.My feelings are that this was something truly out of this world.
content.summary: Very odd flight path, abrupt changes in direction, pulsing light not stationary to us aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work at 5:15 am.  driving by a car lot with a lighted lot.  the object came over the road just a little ahead of me and very low.  it appeared like two diamonds butted together at the big end and was rotating clock wise very slowly.  color was dull grey with no reflection and every other plane was black also with no reflection.  i watched it fly across the road in the ambient light from the car lot.  the craft had no lights or sound so as it got away from the ambient light i lost it over the woods.  heading north west.  my first impression was that this was some kind of a satellite but after talking it over with the wife im not so sure.
content.summary: Diamond shape, clockwise rotation, passed overhead, moving slow, not a sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on orchard lake fishing, when a friend pointed out "ufo". there were three orb/saucer like vessels traveling in a perfect triangle formation not skipping a beat. they went from one end of the horizon to the other silently and slowly. until they were out of sight. there were four witnesses on the boat. two being skeptics one more than the other. one orb disappeared. maybe due to distance or relocation.  it defiantly gave me a chilling feeling to see. which everyone knows you do not get from airplane. ufo is a vague phrase to me, could be government spy planes. i do not know. but was weird.
content.summary: Perfect formation, silent, no definitive structure, clear evening sky, four witnesses. over a lake

content.detailedDescription: There was 2 sightings in one night.The first was a sighting on a object that we reported a few weeks ago.A slow moving object star like in appearance that would fade in and out and then get really bright and then totally disappear and then reappear in another part of the sky while staying on a east to west path of movement.This sighting took place from 11:11 pm to 12:02 am but never more than a few seconds at a time.The 2nd sighting happened almost as soon as the other sighting had ended at 12:11 am it was another craft of some sort moving at a high rate of speed from east to west again at a much lower altitude than the first sighting.It was a saturn shape yellowish orange really classic saucer shaped craft.I heard a clear hum  or static noise but my husband did not.As soon as it went over we began to hear a screaming of sorts almost like animals screaming if that is possible.Then several dogs in the neighborhood started to howl and wale for 20 minutes after the event.This was the first time i had felt uncomfortable with this phenomenon.
content.summary: 2 events .First a slow moving light that would pulse at a very slow rate .2nd event a saucer saturn shaped craft zoomed by us.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were on our front porch july 4, 2013, around 9:50 p.M.  we heard distant fireworks and thought maybe we could see them.  as we started to go back into our house, two objects in the eastern sky caught my husband's eye.  it was a very clear night.  we live in a rural area with no street lights and have the most amazing view of the sky.  

we both watched - they were round, orange lights, and they moved from south to north.  they were apart, but moving consistently.  there was no sound, nothing was blinking or pulsating, and the lights remained steady.  they didn't appear to us to be moving quickly, but we had no idea how close or far away they were.  i tried to catch a video on my iphone but, since i had only recently gotten it, had no idea how to do a video.  i was able to take a picture but there are no reference points to it so it just appears as a non-descript light.

our view was obscured briefly by a large tree, so we watched the sky where we thought they would emerge, but nothing.  we wondered where they could have gone and began talking about what they could be - airplanes, drones, satellites, etc.  the lights were obviously not consistent with an airplane's, and the general consensus about drones is that they have no lights!  i immediately wanted to go on the web to see if anyone else saw these lights and as we turned to go back into the house, another one went by!  it was the very same size, moving at the same pace, and in the same flight path.  it, too, was silent and unblinking.  we watched it go past the same tree and didn't see it emerge either.

just last night, july 11, 2013, at 11:00 p.M. my son came bursting through our bedroom door to tell us that there was another orange light in the sky (he didn't witness last week's sighting, just his own on july 11, 2013).  i immediately got up and went out to the front porch with him.  

there it was, the very same color and shape as the 3 my husband and i saw exactly a week before but, this time, it was just hovering.  there was no sound, no blinking lights.  we watched it for about 15 seconds.  the light disappeared, came back on, then went off again permanently.  we couldn't see it again.  my son and i talked about how it was a thursday night again and that maybe something went around the earth in an orbit that was exactly a week, but we were both still amazed.  

it is now 8:30 friday morning, july 12.  i am online once again trying to find out if anyone has witnessed these lights and i want to make a report of my own.  i'm finding reports of glowing orange lights in the sky from as far back as a year ago, and others as recently as last week.  we are excited to think that it could be "other-worldly" and find ourselves sitting on our porch every evening with the hopes of seeing these lights again.
content.summary: 3 lights moving in the eastern sky, south to north 7/4/13; 1 light of the same description hovering in same area 7/11/13

content.detailedDescription: being outside for a smoke, i observed a hovering blinking object in the northwest at 11:00pm. then i observed an orb like object that was dropped from hovering object. i quickly went into the garage to fetch my binoculars. the hovering object was observed for three minutes as it traveled slowly to the northwest until treetop level obscured my view. i do not believe it was a flare that was dropped from the main object. i noticed it because the stars were shining brightly that night,and the hovering object was blinking very rapidly. i do not think it was a type of aircraft that we would have.
content.summary: Star like orb dropped from hovering object

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend where preparing to go to sleep. and when i look out through the window in the bedroom i saw this big light. and i told to my gf, "come, come and see this", the light was flickering (it might be a chinese lantern but i think it was to big, and uncommon in my town especially over a village). on the left i had storm clouds coming in and on the rest of the sky was clear. this light slowly moved behind a cloud and never saw it again this took around 5 minutes. after a few second in a cloud clearing i saw a rapid white flash of light, after that i went to bed.

i could have filmed this. but because my camera is really old and i think my sensor is acting up (makes some lines on the entire image) i did not film this. to bad because it was amazing. this event took place a few days after i saw another light traveling to nw.
content.summary: Large star like object red-orange in color flickering. it was really huge and beautiful on the blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: We kept seeing lights traveling very fast as we were looking at stars in our yard then more lights zipped by n a couple just seemed to disappear and then out of nowhere three then four came from all directions, we thought they were going to collide or were attacking each other then passed so close they looked like one light for a split second and continued on then just dissappeared we were frozen in fear n then ran inside a bit later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: There were several in every direction all at once

content.detailedDescription:
I was working in west texas for a water hauler company. my night job was filling fracking tanks for energy companies to use to frack formation in drilled wells. i had to stand on top of my truck to monitor the volumne as i unloaded by pump my tanker. i would lose prime on pump if it fell to low. we had a bright light that lit the area up around the tanks being filled. i was on the fartherest row of tanks away from the light station. i had my back to the light in the west. i was facing east and looking up for meteors in th dark sky in front of me and periodicly check the volumne. as i was facing east i notice an object in my right peripheral vision that my mind was saying a flock of birds due to the size. even as i looked directly at it for an instance my mind finally realized it was a triangle shape vessel. the bottom had 5 slightly glowing domes in the triangle shape and the light glow was in the flight pattern of geese flying as seasons change. anyway it was silent made no sound. it moved at an angle from my right to in front of me or i turn more in the direction it was flying. when it came to my front it turned slightly and the shape changed due to the rear was now in vision. and accelerated and in less than a second speed away. the rectangle shape , or rear of vessel just grew smaller until it disappeared.
the vessel moved like some low altitude jets do in flight manuvers here in alabama where i live. the 5 domes were surrounded by black color that i could see against the star lit sky. the sides had lower half black and upper half lighter grey color. the  top was the same grey.
the vessel was hard to determine how far away it was but if it was around 1/4 mile away it was about 300 to 400 feet long and the rear was about 150 to 250 feet wide. it was maybe 75 feet thick. the domes were about 20 feet in diameter with black space, color, in between them. that is the best i can describe it now.

email me if you have any questions.

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Silent triangle vessel moving and changing direction in flight

content.detailedDescription: Looked up and noticed a lower star type object hoving and making random turns and twist
content.summary: Star like red/white making figure 8's and multiple patterns staying in mainly the same area

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I had just finished my daily walk when i saw a probably white light in the sky (sunset was occurring around then). it was about 8:30 p.M. then. it must have been between 45 degrees and 90 degrees above the horizon; i'd guess about 70 degrees above the horizon. whenever i started looking around, i would lose sight of the object, and it would take a few seconds to find it again. the object was stationary, as far as i could tell, with sunset, planes, and clouds drawing my attention every couple of minutes. i thought it was just a balloon or a star, but it seemed to not move at all, meanwhile a cloud was changing its position every 30-seconds-to-a-minute, so i don't think it was a balloon. then, sometime before 9:30 p.M., i'd guess about 8:47 p.M., the object wasn't there anymore when i tried to look for it. i thought it had disappeared behind a cloud, but the object still wasn't there even after the cloud passed.
content.summary: Daytime white stationary light in sky that wasn't there about 20 minutes later

content.detailedDescription: In florida, i was swimming late at night at around 10:45 to relax a little before bed. suddenly, i looked up and saw a black oval like object fly east to west. it had five lights on the back and no visible engine. i only saw it for a few seconds before i couldn't see it through the trees. i was scared to death.
content.summary: Oval like aircraft flew east to west in a straight line, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: i posted another photo a couple of weeks ago, again...Nothing seen until photo's taken. have decided to start trying this more often, although this is only the 2nd time since the first photo i took in a different state. my grandmother has accounted quite a few abductions over her life, other family members including grandmother..Reported to mufon around year 2000ish of a huge and low one in our backyard (of which i was not around to see) followed by black helicopters soon after. my grandmother's health is currently extremely declining and she is nearing the end, so i'm determined to keep up on this subject and get as many answers as i can. she's been very interested in these photographs and urges me to send them to you all at mufon. i will continue to take photographs and report them as/when i feel compelled to; as it seems i may have quite the luck to capture some skyward anomalies. whether or not they are crafts or even what kind, i'm not quite sure..But i really would like to get one that is undeniable eventually.
content.summary: Backyard, nothing seen but on camera

content.detailedDescription: I live here in ocean view on the big island and saw the red "light" ..... it was around 9 pm .... it wasn't a flare nor any type of fireworks.... it stayed in one place...Not moving.... at about 30 to 35 degrees in the sky ...I viewed through my trees! unfortunately, i ran in the house to get my zoom lense on the camera....And poof!! it was gone. i'm so happy to hear someone else on the island saw it too!!! mahalo
content.summary: 4th of july over south point on big island hawaii....

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on old hickory blvd at brick church pk. at 12:a.M. i thought i saw a hot air ballon shaped like a a can of soup. then i realized it was night time and the craft was headed to three large cell towers and a lot of guide wires. as i got closer the bottom was luminated yellow-orange about 15% up and the craft had angled facets that started at the bottom and was lost in the dark but, you could see the outline of the the craft.  
      it moved over the hill i followed it to the other side it would move and stop dim a little get brighter move and stop. then it moved around the towers and i lost sight again. i drove down brick church pk. and it started to slow over a pasture near i-24 the light got dark and i could see the outline of the craft and it was not there after a short time.
      if it had been a ballon it would have never made it across the hills ,terrian and the towers and wires and where did the thing go...
i know it has been nine years but i remember it like yesterday and it just does not add up. call me if you need anything 615-357-7705
content.summary: I saw a cylinder shaped craft pass through three large towers and wires

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my vacations in the pyramids, cairo.
i was on the camel heading away from the pyramids, when doing this, i was taking photos with my galaxy s3, with the frontal camera.
taking a lot of photos.

but i did not realize the ufo until i got home, when i started to look at the photos.

i thought immediately that it is a ufo.

amazing indeed.
content.summary: Ufo in giza pyramids.
